author: Special Correspondent
text: R. Ananda Vignesh (20) of Andipatti, a first-year student of a polytechnic college at Dharapuram, and his friend K. Praveen (22), drowned in Vaigai river on Friday. The duo were swimming with three other friends near the Vaigai dam when the mishap occurred. Andipatti police seized the bodies and registered a case.
title: Two drown in Vaigai river
